metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16140 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A buffer underwrite vulnerability in get_line() (read.c) in fig2dev 3.2.7a allows an attacker to write prior to the beginning of the buffer via a crafted .fig file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16140` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7a-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7a-7').
